name: The Charm of Love
description:
The Charm of Love [visual novel, yuri, fantasy, romance, ADV]

My life began to sparkle with new colors when I entered one of the best universities in the country! But I just relaxed too quickly and did not notice how the time came for the exams. And some professors have never seen me! Well, that's okay. Fortunately, I'm smart enough to create the Amulet of Fortune. But... does it work correctly?

Game Features:
* colorful illustrations;
* three love interests;
* magic and fun!
